meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>origin</kanji> is the <vocabulary>origin</vocabulary>, but it also refers to the <vocabulary>ground spring</vocabulary>s, where the origin of water comes from.
readingMnemonic: Since this word is made up of a single kanji, it probably uses the kun'yomi reading. You did not learn this reading, so here's a mnemonic to help you to remember: Think of how this <vocabulary>ground spring</vocabulary> is everyone's (皆) origin (元). Everyone can use it, it's the 皆元!
